Welcome to our Health Tracker

Instructions

Select a page from the navigation bar above.

This website was designed for users to track aspects of their personal health. This app is not designed to be used as a medical tool, but for personal benefit. Take a look at suggested resources and articles that may aide in improving your physical and mental health!


Page Menu:

  • Personal health info: options to log, change and view personal health info in our tracking database.
  • Public Health Tips

Add or update Your personal health information below.

Check out a few resources that may help imporve your health!


For your physical health...

Get outside!

Going on a walk or hike, just for 30 minutes a day, can benefit your health greatly! This website has great resources for finding trails nearby.

For your mental health...


If you are in crisis, get immediate help!

Call 911 or the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 1-800-273-TALK (8255)
